summary: Comprehensive UI animation and image optimization testing for Ocean Color website. All requested UI improvements are working correctly: Service card hover effects with gradient borders and 3D transforms, click animations in Preisrechner (selection-pulse, click-ripple, check-pop), and image optimization with shimmer placeholders, lazy loading, width/height attributes, and fetchpriority.
